chart.title: Electricity generation from gas
chart.subtitle: Measured in [terawatt-hours](#dod:watt-hours).
chart.citation: Ember (2025); Energy Institute - Statistical Review of World Energy (2025)

Electricity from gas - TWh.descriptionProcessing: - While the Energy Institute (EI) provides a longer time series (dating back to 1965) than Ember (dating back only to 1990 for European countries and 2000 for other countries), EI does not cover all countries or all sources of electricity (for example, generation from bioenergy is missing). Therefore, when data from Ember is available for a given country and year, we use it as the primary data source. Where Ember data is unavailable, we supplement it with data from EI.
Electricity from gas - TWh.citationShort: Ember (2025); Energy Institute - Statistical Review of World Energy (2025) – with major processing by Our World in Data
Electricity from gas - TWh.citationLong: Ember (2025); Energy Institute - Statistical Review of World Energy (2025) – with major processing by Our World in Data. “Electricity generation from gas” [dataset].
